Posts.Content: Hello Forum members, first I must say I am not a patient, I am a physician. I wanted to share with the forum members this post in my blog. I recently posted about management of breast cancer in the elderly please find the link here <link deleted as per policy> in the above post, I provide a very concise review of this very important topic. please feel free to review the entire blog at <link deleted as per policy> I hope it will be of help. Thanks.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer in the elderly
